headline: Strategically Building A $100,000 Dividend Portfolio, With Altria As Your Core Holding
summary: Altria's 7.46% dividend yield and low beta factor make it an attractive portfolio leader. See why MO stock enhances income and lowers volatility risk.

headline: Dow Jones Sustainability(TM) World Index Includes Linde for the Twenty-Second Consecutive Year
